name: thtr
description: cool weekend project with olivier desmoulin & jerome gangneux about theatre
author: Adrien Joly

scripts.convert: for f in $(find ./plays -name '*.txt'); do node parse.js $f >${f%.txt}.json; done
scripts.apply-emoji: for f in $(find ./plays -name '*.json'); do node apply-emoji.js $f; done
scripts.test: node server.js & sleep 2 && echo "" >tests.log && curl http://localhost:3000/api/plays | jq . >>tests.log && curl http://localhost:3000/api/play/fourberies/act/1 | jq . >>tests.log && kill $!
